thread.title: Justin Bieber Returns To Instagram… To Make $$$!
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Returns To Instagram… To Make $$$! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Justin Bieber Returns To Instagram… To Make $$$!
text:
About time, dude!!
As we reported in August , Justin Bieber dramatically deleted his Instagram account after fans bullied (now ex-girlfriend) Sofia Richie ! 
Fast forward to Friday, the Biebs is back… and he's making dough!
Related: Justin Bieber Gets Into It On The Hockey Rink 
The Purpose singer released his Super Bowl commercial for T-Mobile where he plays a "celebration expert" who takes us through the history of the end zone dance. The silly clip also features football studs Rob Gronkowski and Terrell Owens . 
At the end, the Canadian singer wants everyone to show off their dance moves with the hashtag #unlimitedmoves. The day after the game, Bieber will retweet his favorites.
Now that JB is back on IG, we hope he'll post more selfies just like the good ol' days!
To see the hilarious video, ch-ch-check it out (below)!
